Html: I am using php 5.2.12 with my PHPExcel. It does not work stating I need the ZIP dll. I have done everything in the INI yet still nothing seem to do any good. Any help would be appreciated.
What is the zip extension is visible in the phpinfo?

You need the zip extension (on Windows php_zip.dll). If enabled, you have something like : 
Zip     enabled
Extension Version   $Id: php_zip.c 305848 2010-11-30 11:04:06Z pajoye $
Zip version     1.8.11
Libzip version  0.9.0
in the php_info (example from a php 5.2.17)
